name: jupyter-output-mirror
description: Mirror Jupyter Notebook stdout/stderr to a VS Code Output channel.

commands.title: Jupyter Output Mirror: Clear Output Channel

jupyterOutputMirror.includeTextPlain.description: Also mirror text/plain outputs (not just stdout/stderr).

jupyterOutputMirror.timestamp.description: Prefix each chunk with an ISO timestamp.

jupyterOutputMirror.activeNotebookOnly.description: Mirror only from the currently active notebook editor.

jupyterOutputMirror.stripAnsi.description: Strip ANSI color codes before appending to Output.

jupyterOutputMirror.maxChunk.description: Maximum characters appended per change to prevent floods.
